page.title: 17A day in the life of ......
page.content: On a typical day away from school a young girl will do a lot to help her mum. She will go shopping and then do housework such as tidying up her room. Boys don't do a lot of this unless their parents force them to do it. Usually some time is spent watching television, especially after eating dinner. If they have grandparents living nearby they will visit them as often as they can, doing things for them like errands. A lot of kids go to discos and youth clubs if there are any nearby. Discos are good because everyone can get dressed up in their best gear. If it is a nice summer day then a lot will go to Southport which is only a few miles away and has a beach and fair as well as amusement arcades. When at school most kids go to bed about 10 o'clock.
